name: If

inputs.name: Enter
inputs.description: The input execution that triggers this node

inputs.name: Condition
inputs.description: A boolean value that determines which output execution to be taken. Select it to pass the true value only.

outputs.name: True
outputs.description: Execute the next node if condition is true

outputs.name: False
outputs.description: Execute the next node if condition is false

description: Take different executions based on conditions.
